title: LTB: T208 Cullivan's Fireside and Horizontal Matty

posts.post_title: LTB: T208 Cullivan's Fireside and Horizontal Matty
posts.post_content:
Anyone have a T208 Fireside for sale? 

Also looking for at T216 Matty, or any card with the same horizontal pose (one of the E cards would be fine too, especially Croft's Cocoa). 

Please PM me if you have something available. 

Wishing a Merry Christmas/Happy Holidays to the Net54 community. 

Ben
